statements: SELECT * FROM biopharma_inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM biopharma_inventory ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT product_id, quantity, expiration_date FROM biopharma_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%capsule%';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM biopharma_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM biopharmaceutical_products ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE transaction_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer='ABC Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT tracking_id, transaction_type, transaction_datetime FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY transaction_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer='Manufacturer A';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM biopharmaceutical_products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, manufacturer FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, product_id DESC;

SELECT biopharmaceutical_products.product_id, tracking_id, transaction_type, transaction_datetime FROM biopharmaceutical_products JOIN inventory_tracking ON biopharmaceutical_products.product_id = inventory_tracking.product_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT location, product_name FROM biopharmaceutical_products ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Vaccine%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE event_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, location, quantity FROM biopharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND location LIKE '%Storage%' ORDER BY location, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE event_time >= '2022-01-01' AND event_time <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY tracking_id;
SELECT supplier_id, product_id, shipping_status FROM supply_chain_management WHERE received_quantity > 500 ORDER BY supplier_id, product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Product ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Supplier WHERE location='New York';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, price FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_number FROM Supplier WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Product WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, w.location, i.quantity FROM Product p JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, current_inventory FROM warehouses ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, shipment_id, product_id, quantity_transferred, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE quantity_transferred >= 100;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, products.product_name, warehouses.location FROM shipments JOIN products ON shipments.product_id = products.product_id JOIN warehouses ON shipments.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id ORDER BY shipments.shipment_date DESC;

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, transactions.quantity_transferred, products.product_name, shipments.shipment_date FROM transactions JOIN products ON transactions.product_id = products.product_id JOIN shipments ON transactions.shipment_id = shipments.shipment_id WHERE transactions.quantity_transferred > 10;
